t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: COKTIK Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle With Straw Lid, 22 oz Wide Mouth Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Water Bottle Leakproof Lightweight for Hiking, Biking, Running(FOG)
s: Summary: I used Hydro Flask brand stainless bottles for years, so wanted to compare it to a couple of lower cost China offerings. Also found that my really old Hydro Flasks no longer keep my water cold. Ordered this half gallon (64 oz) by COKTIK, as I kept running out of water on longer work days.
